title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, February 13, 2021
description: American religious historian Elaine Pagels turns 78 today. Best known for her books about the Gnostic Gospels, 13 texts found in 1945 in Nag Hammadi, Egypt.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
